executive_summary.headline: IoS-010 PHASE A ACTIVATION: COMPLETE
executive_summary.strategic_milestone: FjordHQ epistemic loop is now LIVE. Beliefs materialize to forecasts, outcomes are captured, reconciliation infrastructure operational.

phase_a_verification.mandate: Materialize all existing model_belief_state records (361) into formal forecasts. Begin outcome capture from sovereign_regime_state_v4.

early_reconciliation.note: 11 forecasts expired (FX pairs with no matching outcomes). 350 forecasts pending maturity (T+24h). This is expected behavior.

domain_overlap_analysis.note: 15 forecast domains (primarily FX pairs) have no corresponding outcomes in sovereign_regime_state_v4

fixes.issue: Used REGIME_CLASSIFICATION but constraint only allows REGIME

fixes.fix: Changed srs.regime to srs.sovereign_regime, srs.confidence to NULL, srs.regime_probabilities to srs.state_probabilities

fixes.issue: DB_CONFIG missing password field; ABS(interval) not supported in PostgreSQL
fixes.fix: Added password to DB_CONFIG; moved ABS() to wrap EXTRACT(EPOCH) result

adr_017_orchestrator_mandate.assertion: All daemon executions via orchestrator_v1.py ONLY
adr_017_orchestrator_mandate.prohibition: No manual execution, no ad-hoc runs, no parallel pipelines

phase_c.action: Skill metrics aggregation and lesson extraction

attestation.statement: VEGA hereby attests that CEO-DIR-2026-008 Phase A Activation is COMPLETE. All 361 model beliefs have been materialized to formal forecasts. Outcome capture from sovereign_regime_state_v4 is operational with 471 regime outcomes captured. All daemon executions were performed exclusively via orchestrator_v1.py as mandated. Four bugs were identified and fixed during activation. The epistemic loop is now LIVE and awaiting forecast maturity for Phase B reconciliation.

ceo_notification.subject: CEO-DIR-2026-008 Phase A: COMPLETE
summary: 361 beliefs materialized to forecasts via orchestrator
350 forecasts awaiting T+24h maturity for reconciliation
ceo_notification.recommended_action: Monitor Phase B reconciliation run at T+24h. First skill metrics expected after Phase C (T+48h).
ceo_notification.strategic_milestone: The epistemic loop is LIVE. FjordHQ now forms expectations, captures outcomes, and will reconcile truth. The system can now learn from its own predictions.
